_template.name: Block Command Hook
_template.description: Block specific bash commands before they execute

placeholders.PATTERN: The grep pattern to match (e.g., 'git push', 'rm -rf')
placeholders.REASON: The reason shown to Claude when blocked

hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -q 'PATTERN'; then echo 'Blocked: REASON' >&2; exit 2; fi
